fixes.name: Profit
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted Tableau calculated field [Profit] = [Sales] * .575 into a DAX calculated column performing row-level multiplication.

fixes.name: Gross Profit Total
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted Tableau [Profit] * 2.5 into a DAX calculated column using the row-level 'Profit' column defined above. This is a calculated column because the expression is row-level and contains no aggregations or parameters.
